introduction.title: Introduction
items: I value finding the **optimal balance between user experience and security**, strengthening security while considering user convenience.

I believe that most opinion conflicts arise from differences in methodology, so I **decide on methods at the end** after understanding the other party's intentions and background to naturally determine solutions.
I enjoy working as a team and strive to **clearly set team direction and goals** to help all team members move consistently and minimize confusion due to lack of goal orientation.
When dealing with web and cloud issues, I approach them through **creative methods** to find new solutions without being bound by existing approaches.
I am interested in learning new security techniques and tools, and I aim to continuously develop and grow myself to fit the latest environment.
